sections.heading: Unlawful control6-142.Unlawful controlA person shall not directly or indirectly acquire control of a bank, trust company, savings bank, savings and loan association or controlling person, except with the approval of the deputy director or as otherwise allowed by this article
sections.text: Unlawful control6-142.Unlawful controlA person shall not directly or indirectly acquire control of a bank, trust company, savings bank, savings and loan association or controlling person, except with the approval of the deputy director or as otherwise allowed by this article.
